work.name: California Correctional Healthcare Services

Grew CCL team to 7 developers
Continued responsibilities listed under Research Data Supervisor I position below

Trained, troubleshooted, and QA (quality assurance) staff assignments

Continued responsibilities listed under Research Data Analyst II position below
